column2: author=Edited by William A. Emerson Jr.

column1: '''''Saturday Evening Post''''' '''(2 July 1966)''' contains the article "[[The Hobbit-forming World of J.R.R. Tolkien]]" (pp. 90-94) by Henry Resnik (illustrated by Paula Powers). The article includes extracts from an interview with [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] conducted on 2[?] March 1966.
*[[Wayne G. Hammond]] and [[Christina Scull]] (2006), ''[[The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide]]: Chronology'', p. 657</small>
